content: crocheters of every skill level will appreciate the textured pattern and practical hanging loop of this cloth which is at home in the bathroom or the kitchen make your cloth in a solid color for a bold pop or mix your favorite color palette for a unique project youtube video here https //www youtube com/watch v=nfbqsohny48 note on youtube the pattern title is easy and fast crochet washcloth half moon washcloths are practical fun to make and perfect for gifting
